text: Samyye blizkiye k Ibrakhimu i yego religii te, kotoryye za nim posledovali, kogda on byl poslan, i shli po pryamomu puti Allakha, a takzhe prorok Mukhammad - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet! - i te, kotoryye uverovali vmeste s nim v Allakha. Oni, kak i Ibrakhim, iskrenne priznayut yedinobozhiye. Allakh lyubit tekh, kotoryye uverovali, i pomogayet im. Allakh - Drug veruyushchikh! On nagradit ikh v posledney zhizni i vvedot ikh v ray
